meanings.sent1: Her inaptitude in math made it challenging for her to solve the problem.
meanings.sent2: His inaptitude for painting was evident in the messy canvas before him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his inaptitude in cooking, he tried to make dinner for his family with disastrous results.
meanings.sent4: The inaptitude of the broken compass led them deeper into the forest instead of guiding them out.
meanings.sent5: The candidate's inaptitude during the interview cost him the job opportunity.

meanings.sent1: The inaptitude of the worn-out shoes for hiking became apparent on the rocky trail.
meanings.sent2: Her inaptitude for public speaking made her nervous before the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The inaptitude of the umbrella in the windy storm turned it inside out within seconds.
meanings.sent4: His inaptitude in handling delicate equipment resulted in a costly mistake at work.
meanings.sent5: The team's inaptitude in teamwork led to a chaotic and unproductive meeting.
